summary: Added .cursorrules file to GitHub repository and enhanced agent handoff guide with detailed cursor rules setup instructions. Fixed server startup issues (ES module __dirname, GIN index syntax) and webhook endpoint. Server now running and webhook is accessible. Committed cursor rules and updated handoff guide to both dev and main branches.
current_status: Cursor rules now in GitHub repository. Agent handoff guide updated with comprehensive cursor rules setup instructions. Server running with webhook endpoint accessible. All changes committed and pushed to both branches. New agent will have complete context including cursor rules.
